BT.managers

Class DistanceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.managers.DistanceCalculatorModel
      • BT.managers.DistanceCalculator

  • public class DistanceCalculator
extends DistanceCalculatorModel
    Class for calculating distances with Lines. Between point and line segment and calculating intersection point of object boundaries and lie segment.
    Author:
    Karel Hala

    • Method Detail

      • getDistanceOfPointToSegment

        public double getDistanceOfPointToSegment(int x1,
                                 int y1,
                                 int x2,
                                 int y2,
                                 int pointX,
                                 int pointY)
        Method enveloping the calculation of distance from point to line segment
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of first point determining line segment.
        y1 - y coordinate of first point determining line segment.
        x2 - x coordinate of second point determining line segment.
        y2 - y coordinate of second point determining line segment.
        pointX - x coordinate of clicked point.
        pointY - y coordinate of clicked point.
        Returns:
        double as distance of point to line segment.

      • getPointOfIntersectionLineSegments

        public java.awt.Point getPointOfIntersectionLineSegments(java.awt.Point pointA,
                                                java.awt.Point pointB,
                                                int width,
                                                int height)
        Method that will calculate point of intersection of line segment and width or height of object. It will check sector in which lines do intersects. And then it will calculate the point.
        Parameters:
        pointA - first point of lineSegment.
        pointB - second point of lineSegment.
        width - width of object.
        height - height of object.
        Returns:
        double as distance of point to line segment
